items.name: iPhone 12 Pro
items.Description: Meet the ultimate iPhone. With the fastest smartphone chip. 5G speed. A Pro camera system that’s killer in low light. A LiDAR Scanner for more realistic AR. And two great sizes to choose from — including our largest display ever. Let’s see what this thing can do better then ever iPhone done before.
